hideout_5d6282d64e7f7ccdcb940567: Scavs akan mencoba mencari berbagai barang untuk Anda, tetapi tentu saja hanya jika Anda membayar dengan benar.
hideout_5d78c1461d79cb822a38b5f7: Membuka kustomisasi senjata lengkap di luar serangan
hideout_6242ae6af8a4ecb3a94f7350: Membuka pemeliharaan senjata dengan perlengkapan perbaikan
hideout_6242aef167801cf6ebb6f601: Membuka pemeliharaan armor dengan perlengkapan perbaikan
hideout_RepairArmorBonus: Mengurangi biaya perbaikan armor menggunakan kit perbaikan
hideout_RepairWeaponBonus: Mengurangi biaya perbaikan senjata menggunakan peralatan perbaikan
hideout_UnlockArmorRepair: Membuka perbaikan armor melalui perlengkapan perbaikan
hideout_UnlockItemCharge: Buka kemampuan untuk mengisi daya baterai
hideout_UnlockScavPlay: Buka kemampuan untuk bermain sebagai Scav
hideout_UnlockWeaponRepair: Membuka perbaikan senjata melalui perlengkapan perbaikan
hideout_area_0_stage_1_description: Saluran ventilasi yang digantung di langit-langit. Saluran udara ini melewati sebagian ruangan, sehingga memungkinkan pergerakan udara alami. Saluran ini diperlukan untuk pemasangan di area "berasap" di mana diperlukan pembuangan produk pembakaran.
hideout_area_0_stage_2_description: Saluran ventilasi dasar dengan sistem ventilasi bunker darurat tambahan untuk aliran udara eksternal. Kini, selain pembuangan produk pembakaran, akan ada udara segar di Hideout.
hideout_area_0_stage_3_description: Saluran ventilasi yang dilengkapi kipas angin listrik untuk meningkatkan laju aliran udara. Sistem sirkulasi udara yang lengkap diperlukan untuk produksi lanjutan dan penelitian kimia.
hideout_area_10_stage_1_description: Setiap orang membutuhkan tempat untuk bekerja dengan peralatan mereka. Meja kerja sederhana memungkinkan Anda melakukan modifikasi dasar senjata dan membongkar berbagai komponen teknis.
hideout_area_10_stage_2_description: Tempat kerja yang dilengkapi dengan segala sesuatu yang diperlukan untuk produksi amunisi sederhana dan tugas teknis yang lebih rumit yang diperlukan untuk meningkatkan tempat persembunyian Anda.
hideout_area_10_stage_3_description: Meja lengkap untuk ahli pembuat senjata. Meja ini memungkinkan Anda memproduksi kartrid yang lebih canggih dan terlibat dalam tugas-tugas berteknologi tinggi, perakitan dan pembongkaran perangkat elektronik serta sistem mekanis yang kompleks.
hideout_area_11_stage_1_description: Jika generator adalah jantung Hideout, maka pusat intelijen adalah otaknya. Untuk saat ini, ini hanyalah meja dan kursi tua untuk menganalisis berbagai informasi yang dapat membantu Anda melarikan diri dari Tarkov.
hideout_area_11_stage_2_description: Pusat intelijen canggih yang dilengkapi laptop, kini memiliki ruang kerja lebih luas berkat meja tambahan. Berkat Mechanic, pusat ini terhubung ke jaringan komputer terisolasi yang tetap utuh setelah serangan EMP dan isolasi Tarkov.
hideout_area_11_stage_3_description: Pusat intelijen lengkap yang dilengkapi peralatan komputer, perangkat radio, dan alat analisis. Pelarian dari Tarkov tak pernah sedekat ini.
hideout_area_12_stage_1_description: Tempat khusus untuk menembak senjata api. Untuk memudahkan evaluasi hasil tembakan, lapangan tembak ini dilengkapi dengan target popper siluet logam untuk jarak dekat, dan target kertas untuk jarak jauh.
hideout_area_12_stage_2_description: Jangkauan yang ditingkatkan dengan rel target yang terpasang di langit-langit dengan tiga tingkat kecepatan.
hideout_area_12_stage_3_description: Lapangan tembak canggih dengan target popper terpasang dan laptop untuk konfigurasi. Juga memungkinkan untuk memulai latihan dengan target rel dan popper acak, skor ditampilkan di monitor laptop.
hideout_area_13_stage_1_description: Perpustakaan rumah dengan berbagai buku dan majalah fiksi dan sains populer.
hideout_area_14_stage_1_description: Kotak khusus tempat para Scav yang disewa khusus menaruh berbagai barang yang mereka temukan.
hideout_area_15_stage_1_description: Pencahayaan dasar dengan lilin parafin, memberikan cahaya redup dan tidak merata.
hideout_area_15_stage_2_description: Pencahayaan tempat persembunyian dengan lampu pijar. Pencahayaannya lebih merata dan lebih terang daripada lilin.
hideout_area_15_stage_3_description: Pencahayaan tempat persembunyian dengan lampu neon memberikan kecerahan dan keseragaman pencahayaan yang optimal.
hideout_area_16_stage_0_description: Dinding ini akan sempurna untuk menyimpan bufet berisi koleksi barang-barang nenek.
hideout_area_16_stage_1_description: Hall of Fame adalah rak khusus tempat Anda dapat menaruh trofi dan barang koleksi Anda.
hideout_area_16_stage_2_description: Rak hebat dari IDEA yang dapat menampung semua patung yang ditemukan dalam penggerebekan dan beberapa tanda pengenal yang diambil dari PMC.
hideout_area_17_stage_1_description: Sistem penyaringan udara, terhubung ke sistem ventilasi umum. Sistem ini menghasilkan udara yang sebersih mungkin dari kotoran berbahaya.
hideout_area_18_stage_1_description: Baterai surya-angin yang dipasang di permukaan meningkatkan pembangkitan daya Hideout secara keseluruhan.
hideout_area_19_stage_1_description: Minuman keras ilegal tersebut memungkinkan Anda untuk menghasilkan minuman keras langsung di tempat persembunyian Anda.
hideout_area_1_stage_1_description: Pintu depan sederhana. Agar orang-orang bodoh tak datang berkunjung. Pintu ini memang tidak melindungi dari angin dan kelembapan, tetapi memberi kesan bahwa tempat persembunyian ini perlahan mulai dihuni.
hideout_area_1_stage_2_description: Aula masuk yang telah direnovasi dengan pintu yang diperkuat, gantungan baju, dan perlengkapan rumah tangga lainnya. Pintu seperti itu tidak bisa ditendang begitu saja.
hideout_area_1_stage_3_description: Sistem keamanan Hideout canggih yang meliputi, selain pintu bunker lapis baja, kamera pengawas video, sistem interkom, alat pemadam kebakaran, serta ikatan khusus untuk meningkatkan kekuatan struktural dinding dan langit-langit.
hideout_area_20_stage_1_description: Peternakan bitcoin dasar sebanyak 10 unit. Dengan memanfaatkan daya komputasi kartu grafis, Anda dapat menggunakan sistem ini untuk menghasilkan bitcoin fisik.
hideout_area_20_stage_2_description: Ladang bitcoin yang telah ditingkatkan sebanyak 25 unit. Dengan memanfaatkan daya komputasi kartu grafis, Anda dapat menggunakan sistem ini untuk menghasilkan bitcoin fisik.
hideout_area_20_stage_3_description: Ladang bitcoin ukuran maksimum untuk 50 unit dengan pendingin air. Dengan memanfaatkan daya komputasi kartu grafis, Anda dapat menggunakan sistem ini untuk menghasilkan bitcoin fisik.
hideout_area_21_stage_1_description: Hiasi tempat persembunyianmu yang keras dengan lampu hias dan pohon Natal. Biarkan rumahmu terasa lebih nyaman dan meriah di masa sulit Tarkov ini.
hideout_area_22_stage_1_description: Sepotong dinding dengan cat yang menggelembung. Tidak serius, tapi mungkin akan segera menjadi masalah.
hideout_area_22_stage_2_description: Sepotong dinding dengan cat yang sangat menggelembung. Air merembes dari dinding. Anda pasti perlu melakukan sesuatu. Mungkin mengelap lantai.
hideout_area_22_stage_3_description: Sepotong dinding dengan cat yang sangat menggelembung. Sebagian catnya terkelupas. Air merembes dari dinding. Sepertinya ada sesuatu di balik dinding ini.
hideout_area_22_stage_4_description: Dinding dengan pintu tersembunyi. Entah siapa yang membuatnya dan kenapa, tapi untuk membukanya, kita butuh alat. Lagipula, menghapusnya sekali lagi juga tidak masalah.
hideout_area_22_stage_5_description: Bagian dinding yang rusak ternyata adalah pintu masuk ke ruang rahasia lama. Tidak ada apa pun di dalamnya selain sampah dan mayat. Butuh banyak upaya untuk merapikan ruangan ini.
hideout_area_22_stage_6_description: Pintu masuk ke ruangan baru yang sudah dirapikan.
hideout_area_23_stage_0_description: Suatu ruang yang dilengkapi untuk tempat kebugaran darurat.
hideout_area_23_stage_1_description: Tempat kebugaran yang lengkap untuk menjaga tubuh Anda tetap dalam kondisi fisik yang baik.
hideout_area_24_stage_0_description: Tempat yang bagus untuk memasang rak senjata.
hideout_area_24_stage_1_description: Rak senjata kecil. Memudahkan penyimpanan senjata api dan memungkinkan Anda memajang senjata dengan cara yang mewah.
hideout_area_24_stage_2_description: Rak senjata berukuran sedang. Memudahkan penyimpanan senjata api dan memungkinkan Anda memajang senjata dengan cara yang mewah.
hideout_area_24_stage_3_description: Rak senjata besar. Memudahkan penyimpanan senjata api dan memungkinkan Anda memajang senjata dengan cara yang mewah.
hideout_area_26_stage_0_description: Tempat ini cocok untuk menaruh beberapa manekin yang biasa ditemukan di pusat perbelanjaan. Hanya perlu sedikit dibersihkan.
hideout_area_26_stage_1_description: Manekin dengan rak senjata. Memungkinkan Anda menyiapkan seperangkat perlengkapan untuk penyerbuan.
hideout_area_26_stage_2_description: Dengan dua manekin, kamu tidak hanya bisa menyiapkan perlengkapan untuk penyerbuan, tetapi juga memajang sesuatu yang keren dan langka. Pasti akan terlihat keren.
hideout_area_26_stage_3_description: Beberapa manekin dengan rak senjata. Dengan lemari seperti ini, akan mudah menyimpan perlengkapan akses cepat untuk segala acara.
hideout_area_27_stage_0_description: Tempat yang bagus untuk bertemu orang-orang berkerudung yang mencurigakan. Meskipun, Anda harus menghubungi mereka terlebih dahulu.
hideout_area_27_stage_1_description: Sebuah lingkaran yang digambar dengan kapur dan dipenuhi simbol-simbol misterius. Lingkaran seperti itu digunakan oleh para pemuja untuk ritual mereka. Orang-orang bertanya-tanya apa yang akan terjadi jika kita menaruh sesuatu di tengahnya...?
hideout_area_2_stage_1_description: Toilet primitif. Fasilitas apa pun tidak tersedia. Hanya ember dan kotak pasir untuk menjaga sanitasi dasar di Hideout.
hideout_area_2_stage_2_description: Kamar mandi sederhana dengan toilet kayu dan wastafel, terhubung ke sistem pasokan air. Semua ini meningkatkan tingkat kebersihan dan higienitas di Hideout.
hideout_area_2_stage_3_description: Kamar mandi canggih dengan kloset kering, pancuran, dan tempat sampah. Semua yang Anda butuhkan terhubung ke sistem pasokan air dan menyediakan tingkat kebersihan pribadi yang paling terjangkau.
hideout_area_4_stage_1_description: Generator bahan bakar sederhana yang dapat menyediakan listrik untuk peralatan dasar Hideout. Inti dari tempat perlindungan Anda. Bahan bakar dibutuhkan untuk menjaga jaringan listrik tetap berfungsi.
hideout_area_4_stage_2_description: Generator berdaya tinggi yang unggul. Memungkinkan Anda menggunakan lebih banyak peralatan listrik. Menyediakan slot tambahan untuk memasang kaleng bahan bakar.
hideout_area_4_stage_3_description: Generator industri untuk memastikan pengoperasian fasilitas produksi secara otonom. Juga menyediakan slot tambahan untuk memasang kaleng bahan bakar.
hideout_area_5_stage_1_description: Tong sederhana dengan kayu bakar untuk menjaga panas. Pilihan yang sangat mendasar untuk pemanas. Berbahaya karena karbon monoksida yang beracun.
hideout_area_5_stage_2_description: Kompor perut buncit adalah kompor logam untuk pemanas ruangan, populer di paruh pertama abad ke-20. Kompor ini tak tergantikan di Hideout, terutama jika dihubungkan ke sistem ventilasi untuk mengeluarkan hasil pembakaran.
hideout_area_5_stage_3_description: Melengkapi seluruh Hideout dengan pemanas listrik tambahan. Kini, dengan kompor perut buncit, Anda tak perlu takut kedinginan.
hideout_area_6_stage_1_description: Sistem air dasar untuk menampung air tanah. Berisi beberapa filter air dan wadah untuk pemurnian air. Salah satu sistem terpenting untuk menjaga kelangsungan hidup di Hideout.
hideout_area_6_stage_2_description: Sistem pengumpulan air canggih dengan pipa tambahan, filter, dan wadah yang lebih besar. Pemasangan pompa memungkinkan peningkatan tekanan di dalam pipa dan, akibatnya, tekanan air.
hideout_area_6_stage_3_description: Sistem pengumpulan air canggih untuk air tanah dan air hujan. Sistem ini terdiri dari berbagai filter pembersih, pompa listrik, dan sistem pasokan air yang komprehensif di seluruh Hideout. Sistem penyaringan dan pengayaan tambahan memungkinkan Anda mendapatkan air yang sangat bersih dan berkualitas tinggi.
hideout_area_7_stage_1_description: Ketersediaan obat-obatan yang berkelanjutan berarti peluang bertahan hidup yang lebih besar setelah penggerebekan. Beberapa kotak penyimpanan medis untuk perawatan medis dasar.
hideout_area_7_stage_2_description: Unit medis yang terdiri dari meja obat, kursi, dan pipet. Proses penyembuhan akan lebih cepat saat Anda tidak diserang.
hideout_area_7_stage_3_description: Laboratorium medis Hideout yang lengkap. Laboratorium ini menyediakan semua yang Anda butuhkan untuk merawat luka, membuat obat, dan menjaga kesehatan Anda selama masa sulit ini.
hideout_area_8_stage_1_description: Makanan di Hideout akan memberi Anda energi untuk serangan berikutnya. Unit nutrisi dasar dengan kulkas tua dan tempat makan memungkinkan Anda memulihkan energi lebih cepat.
hideout_area_8_stage_2_description: Unit nutrisi dengan kulkas, perlengkapan makan, kompor, dan wastafel yang lebih modern, menyediakan makanan yang lebih baik. Energi dipulihkan lebih cepat.
hideout_area_8_stage_3_description: Dapur lengkap dengan kompor yang nyaman, wastafel yang lebih baik, ketel listrik, microwave, dan semua yang dibutuhkan untuk memasak makanan cepat dan berkualitas tinggi saat bepergian keluar rumah. Jangan sampai melanggar diet!
hideout_area_9_stage_1_description: Istirahat sangat penting, terutama di lingkungan Tarkov yang terkepung. Kasur di atas palet adalah hal paling mendasar yang dapat membantu PMC bersantai setelah pertempuran sengit.
hideout_area_9_stage_2_description: Tempat bersantai yang dilengkapi tempat tidur biasa, meja samping tempat tidur, dan bahkan TV tua. Menciptakan rasa nyaman dan membangkitkan kenangan nostalgia akan kehidupan lampau.
hideout_area_9_stage_3_description: Ruang santai dengan sofa, TV LCD dengan konsol Ployka Station, dan sistem stereo. Sulit membayangkan kenyamanan seperti itu bisa terwujud di dalam bunker bawah tanah ketika seluruh dunia seakan terbang ke jurang.
hideoutmanagementdescription: Manajemen Hideout yang efisien memungkinkan Anda menggunakan lebih sedikit bahan bakar dan filter dalam produksi, dan meningkatkan bonus dari berbagai zona Hideout.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_01: Siapa saya sama sekali tidak penting saat ini. Yang penting adalah siapa Anda dan mengapa Anda ada di sini.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_02: Akulah Penjaga Cahaya. Aku mengawasi segalanya dan semua orang, dan semua orang dapat melihat cahayaku. Di masa kita yang penuh kegelisahan ini, sangatlah penting untuk memiliki informasi yang diperlukan. Informasi menciptakan koneksi, koneksi menghasilkan peluang.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_03: Ya. Kesempatan untuk mengubah lingkungan dan, sebagai konsekuensinya, realitas. Dalam lingkungan seperti ini, kebutuhan dasar manusia adalah bertahan hidup. Saya tidak ingin sekadar bertahan hidup, saya ingin mengendalikan kelangsungan hidup itu.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_04: Ya, bagi penyintas. Bagi seseorang yang memastikan kelangsungan hidup, semuanya berbeda. Kita bertemu karena suatu alasan. Semua peristiwa memiliki makna, tidak ada yang namanya kebetulan.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_05: Tapi kamu yang mencariku, kan? Apa kamu bertanya pada diri sendiri kenapa?
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_06: Dekat dengan seseorang yang menganggap keruntuhan sebagai awal dari yang baru. Kamu tidak ingin sekadar bertahan hidup, kamu ingin memegang kendali.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_07: Tarkov adalah dirimu. Kau tak bisa lari dari dirimu sendiri. Sama seperti aku tak bisa lari dari diriku sendiri.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_08: Dunia ini akan kiamat, semua upaya menyedihkan untuk mempertahankan bongkahan es yang mencair di tengah lautan yang mengamuk - semua pertikaian lokal ini, kemunafikan para pedagang, hasutan, kekerasan yang dikalikan dengan kekerasan. Semua ini mengarah pada hasil yang sangat spesifik. Tidak akan ada gerhana, yang akan ada kelahiran kembali.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_09: Anda tidak akan bisa lolos dari Tarkov.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_10: Kamu mungkin tidak mengerti, tapi ini wajar. Aku juga awalnya tidak mengerti, ketika mereka menghubungiku.
keeper_dialog_option_who_are_you_11: Tak ada lagi yang perlu kita bicarakan. Nanti, kamu akan menemukan jawabannya sendiri, sambil mengurai kekusutannya.
keeper_first_greeting_01: Itu kamu? Oke, siapa lagi kalau bukan kamu. Jadi, kamu lulus semua ujianku? Aku Lightkeeper. Kayaknya kamu pernah dengar tentang aku. Semua orang ingin berbisnis denganku, tapi tidak semua orang bisa.
keeper_generic_farewell_03: Sekian dulu untuk saat ini. Semoga harimu menyenangkan.
keeper_generic_farewell_05: Aku akan ada di sini jika kamu membutuhkan sesuatu.
keeper_generic_farewell_06: Mampirlah saat Anda punya waktu sebentar.
keeper_generic_farewell_07: Semoga berhasil. Jangan buat Zryachiy kesal.
keeper_generic_greetings_08: Karena kamu sudah di sini, bicaralah.
keeper_trade_02: Baiklah, saya punya sesuatu yang menarik.
keeper_want_work_reaction_02: Kita baru saja berkenalan. Pada akhirnya, waktunya akan tiba.
keeper_want_work_reaction_03: Aku sedang mengerjakan sesuatu. Jangan terburu-buru.
keeper_want_work_reaction_06: Saya tidak yakin Anda siap untuk ini.
matching/timeout: Gagal menemukan raid. Silakan coba lagi nanti.
matchmaker/return_and_heal_advise: Lebih baik kembali dan sembuh sebelum dikerahkan ke serangan baru
matchmaker/return_and_heal_command: Anda harus kembali dan menyembuhkan diri sebelum ditempatkan di serangan baru
no_free_slot: Tidak ada slot kosong untuk item tersebut
no_free_space_message: Tidak cukup ruang di simpanan untuk memindahkan barang.

Тrading/Dialog/AvailableServices/Descrip: Butuh jasa saya? Nah, Anda sudah memenuhi tujuan Anda, jadi saya akan membantu Anda — kalau Anda bisa membalasnya.
54cb50c76803fa8b248b4571 Description: The Warrant officer in charge of supply warehouses on the sustaining base enforcing the Norvinsk region blockade. Secretly supplied the BEAR PMC operators with weapons, ammunition, and various other provisions he had at his disposal during the Contract Wars.
54cb57776803fa99248b456e Description: Head of the Trauma Care Department of the Tarkov Central City Hospital.
579dc571d53a0658a154fbec Location: A network of trading outlets all over the Norvinsk region
579dc571d53a0658a154fbec Description: The conflict had barely started when Fence began setting up anonymous outlets for buying and selling goods. Keeping incognito, he nevertheless managed to put together a well-organised smuggler network, operating all over the Norvinsk region.
58330581ace78e27b8b10cee Description: Previously a port zone customs terminal employee, who initially oversaw dealings of the terminal's goods. Over the course of the conflict, he put together a gang of thugs in order to grab everything of value that he could lay his hands on in the vicinity of the terminal.
5935c25fb3acc3127c3d8cd9 Description: UN peacekeeping Force supply officer, based in one of the central checkpoints leading to the Tarkov port zone. The blue helmets have been seen poking their heads into small deals from the very beginning of the conflict, buying everything of value in exchange for western weapons, ammo, and all kinds of military equipment.
5a7c2eca46aef81a7ca2145d Location: Chemical Plant Factory within the Customs District
5a7c2eca46aef81a7ca2145d Description: A former chemical plant foreman, who from the very beginning of the conflict took to weapon modification, repairs, and maintenance of complex equipment and technology. He prefers clandestine solo living and operates discreetly, while placing complicated and challenging tasks above all else.
5ac3b934156ae10c4430e83c Description: Previously, he worked as a director in a shopping center located in the suburbs of Tarkov. Now dealing in mostly clothing- and gear-related items, anywhere from sunglasses to body armor.
5c0647fdd443bc2504c2d371 Description: Before the conflict, he worked as a hunter in the Priozersk Natural Reserve under the State Hunting Service. A professional hunter and survival specialist. Even now, he still guards the reserve's hunting grounds from various aggressive individuals.
68fe15990f29ba3fdbba9d55 Description: A multi-function radio station with built-in cryptographic processor.

58fe0e2d86f774720e7a498d 0: Ada apa, prajurit? Apa kau yang kehilangan semua barang di {lokasi} pukul {waktu} {tanggal}? Ambil ini sebelum aku berubah pikiran.
58fe0e2d86f774720e7a498d 1: Kehilangan perlengkapanmu, musketeer? Pfft, ambil saja, Rambo. Aset asuransimu dari {date} pukul {time} di {location} sudah dibawa masuk.
58fe0e2d86f774720e7a498d 2: Sepertinya penggerebekan {date} di {location} gagal, ya? Aku tahu itu, karena orang-orangku membawa barang-barangmu ke sini. Kau yang mengambilnya atau apa?
58fe0e2d86f774720e7a498d 3: Semangat, Prajurit! Asuransimu berhasil, yang dari {tanggal} pukul {waktu} di {lokasi}. Tidak semua orang sering seberuntung ini!
58fe0e2d86f774720e7a498d 4: Hei, penembak nerf! Iya, kamu. Merasa hari ini seperti hari-hari yang buruk saat berkemas untuk penyerbuan {date} di {location}? Kamu benar untuk mendapatkan asuransi. Bawa barang-barangmu dan tanda tangani di garis putus-putus.
58fe0e3486f77471f772c3f2 0: Tentara bayaran, apakah Anda sudah mengasuransikan barang-barang Anda sebelum penggerebekan pada {tanggal} pukul {waktu} di {lokasi}? Anda kembali.
58fe0e3486f77471f772c3f2 1: Anak muda, saya bukan ahli dalam peralatan ini, tapi rupanya ini barang-barang Anda. Barang-barang ini diasuransikan pada {tanggal} pukul {waktu} dan dibawa kembali dari {lokasi}.
58fe0e3486f77471f772c3f2 2: Senang Anda datang ke sini! Beberapa barang telah dikembalikan sesuai dengan asuransi Anda {date} dari {location}. Barang-barang tersebut bukan keahlian saya, jadi harap segera diambil.
58fe0e3486f77471f772c3f2 3: Apakah Anda masih peduli dengan barang-barang Anda yang diasuransikan pada {tanggal} pukul {waktu}? Ambillah sesegera mungkin.
58fe0e3486f77471f772c3f2 4: Senang melihatmu selamat. Perlengkapanmu, yang diasuransikan pada {tanggal}, telah dibawa kembali dari {lokasi}. Mau membawanya?
58fe0e3a86f774725a56b846 0: Saya rasa ini mungkin milik Anda, teman-teman saya menemukannya di {location} pada {date}.
58fe0e4586f774728248ca13 0: Hai, kamu! Aku punya beberapa barangmu yang kamu asuransikan pada {tanggal} pukul {waktu} dan hilang di suatu tempat di {lokasi}. Ingat, aku tidak akan menyimpannya selamanya, paling lama 24 jam!
58fe0e4586f774728248ca13 1: Anjing saya baru saja mengambil banyak barang jarahan dari {lokasi}. Apakah Anda kehilangan sesuatu pada {tanggal} pukul {waktu}?
58fe0e4586f774728248ca13 2: Sudah dengar tentang aksi di {location} sekitar {date} - {time}? Atau mungkin kamu juga ada di sana? Ngomong-ngomong, aku punya banyak hal menarik dari sana. Coba lihat, beberapa mungkin milikmu. Kalau belum, aku akan menjualnya.
58fe0e4586f774728248ca13 3: Saya rasa ini mungkin milik Anda, teman-teman saya menemukannya di {location} pada {date}.
58fe0e4586f774728248ca13 4: Kurasa kamu mengalami kemalangan pada {date} di {location}? Untungnya, anjing-anjingku menemukan beberapa perlengkapanmu.
59008bca86f7745cb11ae67b 0: Asuransi mulai {tanggal} pukul {waktu} selesai. Sampai jumpa lagi.
59008bca86f7745cb11ae67b 1: Jadi? Kita baik-baik saja? Sampai jumpa lagi, aku ada pekerjaan.
59008bca86f7745cb11ae67b 2: Akan menutup kasus asuransi yang terjadi pada {tanggal} pukul {waktu}. Panjang umur dan tetaplah hidup, pejuang.
59008bca86f7745cb11ae67b 3: Hari ini hari keberuntunganmu, kamu pintar mengasuransikan barang-barangmu. Ambil saja dan sampai jumpa nanti.
59008bca86f7745cb11ae67b 4: Untungnya kamu percaya kata hatimu dan mengasuransikan barang-barangmu padaku. Semuanya sudah kusiapkan untukmu. Kasus asuransi selesai.
59008bd186f77459395f4d63 0: Bagus. Saya akan menutup kasus asuransi, yang terjadi pada {tanggal} pukul {waktu}. Saya harap Anda mendapatkan kembali semua yang hilang.
59008bd186f77459395f4d63 1: Baiklah, sekian untuk saat ini. Silakan gunakan layanan asuransi saya kapan pun Anda membutuhkannya.
59008bd186f77459395f4d63 2: Saya menutup kasus asuransi yang terjadi pada {tanggal} pukul {waktu}. Selamat tinggal.
59008bd186f77459395f4d63 3: Kasus asuransi selesai. Sampai jumpa lagi.
59008bd186f77459395f4d63 4: Asuransimu kali ini berhasil. Pastikan untuk membeli yang lain.
59008bd986f7745c295b5fae 0: Asuransi mulai {tanggal} pukul {waktu} selesai. Sampai jumpa.
59008be186f7745bf8452551 1: Saya lihat semuanya berjalan cukup baik, tapi lain kali cobalah untuk lebih berhati-hati. Menutup kasus asuransi untuk {tanggal} pada {waktu}.
59008be186f7745bf8452551 2: Oke, selesai dengan kasus asuransi ini. Kembalilah jika Anda membutuhkan sesuatu, jangan lupa bawa uang tunai.
59008be186f7745bf8452551 3: Barangmu sudah sampai, kasusnya selesai. Mau beli lagi?
5900a71886f7742d9a47454c 0: Hei! Sudah kubilang aku tidak bisa menahan barang-barangmu terlalu lama. Sekarang sudah habis!
5900a71886f7742d9a47454c 1: Apa? Barangmu? Itu bukan lagi milikmu - aku tak sabar menunggumu selamanya, aku sedang mencoba menjalankan bisnis di sini.
5900a71886f7742d9a47454c 2: Kamu di mana, Bung? Aku menyimpan barang-barangmu begitu lama sampai akhirnya aku menjualnya. Maaf ya.
5900a71886f7742d9a47454c 3: Hari ini bukan harimu, batas penyimpanan sudah habis. Ayo cepat ambil barangmu lain kali.
5900a72286f7742daa4835d6 0: Anak muda, saya bukan penjaga gudang dan saya tidak bisa menyimpan barang-barang Anda yang dikembalikan selamanya. Saya khawatir barang-barang ini sudah habis.
5900a72286f7742daa4835d6 1: Apa maksudmu? Seharusnya kamu datang dan mengambil barang yang kamu kembalikan lebih awal - sekarang sudah hilang.
5900a72286f7742daa4835d6 2: Ya, selamat siang. Saya khawatir barang Anda yang diasuransikan tidak dapat diambil karena masa penyimpanannya telah habis. Selamat tinggal.
5900a72a86f7742d9d0593c3 0: Maaf, asuransi {date} selama {time} sudah kedaluwarsa. Seharusnya lebih cepat.
5900a73486f7742ad17008c5 0: Nah-ah. Masa penyimpanan barang Anda sudah habis dan Anda tidak bisa mendapatkan apa pun dari pengembalian asuransi ini. Maaf.
5900a73486f7742ad17008c5 1: Ke mana saja kamu? Aku simpan barang-barangmu selama mungkin, kukira kamu bunuh diri, jadi aku jual semuanya. Kamu pikir tempat penyimpanan di sini gratis? Nggak mungkin!
5900a73486f7742ad17008c5 2: Aku sudah memegang barang-barangmu selama 24 jam! Seharian penuh! Sekarang sudah hilang. Ambil lebih cepat lain kali.
5914450f86f7744bb83be8a2 0: Oke, aku sudah mengirim orang-orangku untuk mengambil barang-barangmu. Tenang saja, prajurit.
5914450f86f7744bb83be8a2 1: Anjing-anjing saya pergi ke {location} untuk mencari barang-barang Anda. Mereka akan mengembalikannya jika masih ada.
5914450f86f7744bb83be8a2 2: Saya mendapat pesan bahwa orang-orang saya sudah di tempat dan mencari barang-barang Anda. Semua yang bisa kami temukan, akan kami bawakan. Jangan khawatir.
5914451a86f7744c2d7102f9 0: Rekan-rekan saya sedang menangani masalah asuransi Anda. Anda harus menunggu beberapa saat.
5914451a86f7744c2d7102f9 1: Jadi, tim saya sudah ada di {lokasi} dan sudah memulai proses pencarian. Kalau barang Anda masih ada, mereka pasti akan menemukannya dan membawanya kembali kepada Anda.
5914451a86f7744c2d7102f9 2: Barang-barangmu hilang di {location}, ya? Kami sudah menanganinya, jangan khawatir.
5914452286f77449d8414ec3 0: Aku sudah mengirim orang-orangku untuk mengambil barang-barangmu.
5914452d86f7744e917870c7 0: Anjing-anjingku pergi mencari barang-barangmu. Tenang saja.
5914452d86f7744e917870c7 1: Anak-anakku pergi ke {location} untuk mengambil barang-barangmu. Semoga saja tidak ada yang mengambilnya.
5914452d86f7744e917870c7 2: Teman-temanku sudah di tempat dan mencari barang-barangmu yang hilang. Jadi, tunggu sebentar.
595f995d86f77476b51172ee 0: Kamu kurang beruntung hari ini, Prajurit. Ada yang mengambil barang-barangmu sebelum kita, jadi jangan berani-beraninya!
595f995d86f77476b51172ee 1: Maaf, asuransimu gagal. Petugasku sudah memeriksa semuanya dan tidak menemukan jejaknya.
595f996586f774767d03cbea 0: Dengan berat hati saya sampaikan hal ini, tetapi tim saya tidak dapat menemukan barang-barang Anda yang diasuransikan. Turut berduka cita.
595f996586f774767d03cbea 1: Saya khawatir tidak ada yang ditemukan.
595f997086f77476ca48057e 0: Maaf, asuransimu gagal. Petugasku sudah memeriksa semuanya dan tidak menemukan jejaknya.
5a2d28f786f77436023be4a5 0: Mengingat kondisi keuanganmu yang sedang sulit, aku memutuskan untuk mengirimkan paket kecil untukmu. Anggap saja ini sebagai investasi untuk masa depan cerah kita bersama.
5c1a3e0686f77445b95c29b3 0: Di mana kamu berhasil kehilangan barang-barangmu? Anak buahku tidak menemukan satu pun barang rongsokanmu, begitu pula lokasi {location} sialan itu.
5c1a3e0686f77445b95c29b3 1: Saya sudah mengirim teman-teman saya untuk mencari di {location}, tetapi tidak ada yang kembali. Sepertinya mereka sudah pergi.
5c1a3e0686f77445b95c29b3 2: Jadi, sejauh yang saya lihat, Anda kehilangan barang-barang Anda di area TerraGroup yang dibatasi. Orang-orang saya biasanya tidak mengunjungi tempat itu, jadi Anda harus menerima bahwa barang-barang Anda hilang.
5c1a3e1886f77445b74fb8b0 0: Anak muda, kamu tidak pergi ke {lokasi}, kan? Itu area terlarang dan masih berbahaya di sana. Sebaiknya kamu lupakan barang-barangmu yang kamu tinggalkan di sana.
5c1a3e1886f77445b74fb8b0 1: Meskipun saya sudah meminta orang-orang saya untuk mencari perlengkapan Anda, meskipun Anda kehilangannya di {location}, teman-teman saya belum kembali. Saya kehilangan kontak dengan mereka.
5c1a3e1886f77445b74fb8b0 2: Segala sesuatu yang hilang di wilayah TerraGroup dianggap hilang selamanya, tetapi saya senang melihat Anda masih dalam kondisi baik.
5c1a3e2a86f77476ad6d23b0 0: Saya sudah mengirim teman-teman saya untuk mencari di {location}, tetapi tidak ada yang kembali. Sepertinya mereka sudah pergi.
5d7133aa86f7745201428fb4 0:
Paket game Anda telah ditingkatkan!
Terima kasih atas dukungan Anda terhadap proyek ini dan telah mengirimkan perlengkapan tambahan!
5da89b1886f77439d7741002 0: Kudengar kau membantu salah satu anak buahku keluar hidup-hidup. Tindakan yang mulia! Anggap saja ini sebagai tanda rasa hormat dan terima kasihku.
5da89b3a86f7742f9026cb83 0: Kerja bagus, kamu sudah menyelesaikannya dan keluar tanpa pertumpahan darah. Aku sudah mengirimkan hadiah penghargaan untukmu. Hormatku.
5e0653ba86f774478f700632 0: Jadi, pejuang, masih waspada, meraup pengalaman? Aku mengagumi orang-orang seperti itu! Ini hadiah kecil untuk kalian!
5e0653ba86f774478f700632 1: Baiklah, prajurit, belajar sesuatu yang baru, ya? Pengalaman ini pasti akan berguna dalam pertempuran, percayalah pada prajurit tua. Kau membuatku bahagia, mengingatkanku pada masa lalu. Ini, terimalah hadiah dariku.
5e0653ba86f774478f700632 2: Berhati-hati? Bagus, kamu tidak akan mengulangi kesalahan orang lain. Aku setuju. Coba ini, pasti berguna untuk bisnismu.
5e0653ba86f774478f700632 3: Kulihat kau tak membuang-buang waktu. Ilmu, Saudaraku, tak hanya penting bagi ilmuwan, tapi juga bagi prajurit. Merekalah yang kelak menjadi profesional. Ambillah ini, semoga bermanfaat.
5fd4c8b59e4b2a58b34bbd28 0: Sepertinya kau baru saja berpisah dari orang-orangmu, kau akan kena peluru kalau tidak waspada di sini. Aku akan memberimu sedikit dorongan. Kulihat kau orang yang baik, dan kita akan membalasnya segera setelah kau terbiasa. Aku selalu membutuhkan pekerja untuk misi-misiku. Oh, ya, semua orang memanggilku Prapor, mari berkenalan.
5fd4c8d49e4b2a58b34bbd29 0: Jadi, sudah tahu apa saja yang ada di sana? Ini beberapa hadiah untukmu, dan tetap waspada saat pergi merampok. Kalau kamu mau berdagang, datanglah menemuiku.
61111d298ed2a0258e30f655 0: Tidak punya waktu untuk obrolan panjang lebar. Saya ingin orang-orang saya bisa bergaul dengan orang lain dengan bebas untuk sementara waktu. Jika Anda bekerja sama dengan mereka, saya akan lebih menghormati Anda daripada biasanya. Mari kita tinggalkan semua yang telah Anda lakukan di masa lalu dan mulai dari awal mengenai kutipan Anda. Tetaplah berhubungan.
6114dbf05266c33358334348 0: Urusan terakhir sudah selesai. Semua yang kami butuhkan telah dievakuasi tanpa masalah, saya sangat menghormati Anda. Ada beberapa orang bodoh yang mencoba bersikap keras, tetapi mereka tidak menimbulkan banyak masalah. Sayang sekali kami tidak bisa menginterogasi mereka. Jika Anda tahu sesuatu tentang mereka, beri tahu saya. Dan terima kasih sekali lagi atas kerja samanya dan sebagainya, sekarang kita kembali pada rasa hormat yang biasa Anda dapatkan karena telah membantu orang-orang saya.
61332c7ed908cc4b2928cb0d 0: Jadi, dengarkan, aku bilang ini karena hubungan kita baik-baik saja. Tempat-tempat yang dulu menyimpan barang-barang itu sudah tidak relevan lagi. Orang-orangku sudah memindahkan dan menyembunyikan hampir semua barang berharga. Jadi, ingat, carilah di tempat lain di lokasi ini.
613f1c2af217a644d378ad31 0: Kita sudah bereskan urusan kita. Hukum semua yang tidak berguna. Sekarang semua orang akan tahu apa yang akan terjadi jika kau menembak anak buahku. Pencapaian besar membutuhkan tim yang solid, bukan sekelompok orang atau tikus. Aku mungkin akan memerintahkan kontak dekatku untuk menyelidiki lebih lanjut apakah urusan sudah stabil. Dan aku berterima kasih padamu karena tidak terlalu banyak ikut campur.
6149dc63b099526ca907837d 0: Anak muda, bagaimana kabarmu? Baru-baru ini, kami menerima banyak sekali korban keracunan alkohol parah, tidak semuanya pulih sepenuhnya. Begitu banyak orang meninggal, bahkan bukan karena peluru! Di masa sulit ini, kita harus memprioritaskan kesejahteraan kita, bukan di mana menemukan minuman keras yang lebih murah. Bagaimanapun, saat ini jumlah pasien jauh lebih sedikit, jadi kurasa mereka sudah menghabiskan semua alkohol yang buruk. Tidak ada lagi bahayanya bagi orang baik. Aku penasaran dari mana mereka mendapatkan semua vodka ini...
615594cc65c019623e6df5d0 0: Halo, pejuang! Saya punya info untuk Anda: petinggi lokal sedang merayakan sesuatu hari ini. Saya tidak akan membocorkan semua kartu, tapi ada seseorang yang sangat tertarik dengan semua kekacauan di Tarkov ini, yah, Anda mengerti maksud saya. Jadi, petinggi ini memutuskan untuk berbagi beberapa hadiah dengan Anda agar lebih seru. Ini, ambillah, Anda akan membutuhkannya. Selamat menikmati!
6162fd9a4d9fe9290664f56d 0: Tentara bayaran, kau bisa tenang sekarang. Anak buahku telah menyelesaikan masalah ini dengan menenangkan semua yang gelisah. Ini memberi mereka pelajaran: jangan pernah ikut campur dalam urusanku. Anak buahku sudah kembali ke kamp mereka dan tidak akan mengganggumu lagi. Kami akan segera menghubungimu.
6171d82d92c75343486cd5fe 0: Bro, dengarkan baik-baik. Pasar tekstil akan segera hancur dan harga kain akan meroket seperti Bitcoin di tahun 2017. Singkat cerita — kalau kamu mau nyetok ripstop, fleece apa pun, mendingan sekarang juga. Kita selalu butuh perban atau sesuatu untuk latihan menyulam silang... ha-ha! Jangan marah, Bro, bercanda. Aku sebenarnya mempercayakan sebuah rahasia besar padamu, seperti saudara kepada saudara, jadi sebaiknya kamu jangan asal membocorkannya. Kamu paham, kan?
6176e604d7d65612115f97ee 0: Halo, Merc. Kamu mungkin menyadari akhir-akhir ini persediaan pakaian sedang menipis. Ada masalah besar dengan pasokan kain, sampai-sampai tidak ada yang bisa dijual sama sekali. Ngomong-ngomong, sekarang keadaannya sudah membaik, jadi jangan lupakan Arshavir dan kunjungi aku lebih sering, ya? Aku tidak ingin kehilangan klien dengan percuma. Izinkan aku memberimu beberapa saran untuk ke depannya: jika kamu punya reputasi baik denganku, kamu akan diberikan informasi tentang situasi serupa yang sedang kuhadapi di bidang bisnisku. Dan kamu akan mendapatkannya lebih awal agar bisa mempersiapkan diri dengan baik.
6176f84b5aa04931e03c8401 0:
Hai, Sobat! Ingat kelangkaan kain yang kuceritakan? Itu sudah berlalu, jadi akhirnya kamu bisa santai dan mampir — konternya penuh dengan barang-barang yang menunggu untuk kamu beli! Sudah kuperingatkan, sudah kusiapkan, seperti kata pepatah: kalau kamu punya reputasi yang cukup dengan Sobat Arshavir-mu, kamu tidak akan pernah celaka.
Sampai jumpa lagi!
618d196e7a507329860ffe1e 0: Halo Sherpa! Kudengar kau membantu banyak pemula di luar sana. Memang berbahaya, tapi berharga. Kau tahu, aku punya sesuatu yang berguna di sini. Ambillah. Membantu orang baik selalu menyenangkan. Semoga sukses dengan seranganmu!
618d19edee326b436e35b96e 0: Halo Sherpa! Katanya kamu salah satu yang terbaik di bidangmu. Dipuji oleh semua orang yang kutanya tentangmu. Anggap saja ini sebagai tanda terima kasihku dan teruslah berkarya agar orang lain mengagumimu. Semoga sukses dengan raid-mu!
61d70e9e6a1ff147937986a3 0:
Moderator yang terhormat,

Kami ingin menyampaikan rasa terima kasih yang tulus dan terdalam atas semua yang telah Anda lakukan untuk komunitas dan Battlestate Games. Upaya ekstra yang telah Anda lakukan untuk membantu para pemain kami selama liburan dan acara kami tidak luput dari perhatian kami. Kami mempersembahkan hadiah kecil yang akan membantu Anda merasa lebih aman dalam game, sementara Anda sibuk memastikan keamanan media sosial kami.

Terima kasih!

678e601d80e518e4d4025a14 0: Kulihat kau mendukung para tentara bayaran yang merekam pengalaman mereka di Tarkov, prajurit. Patut dipuji! Setidaknya ini akan membantumu membersihkan bunker atau gua tempatmu bersembunyi. Ayo, buatlah beberapa kecelakaan kecil yang menyenangkan.

55f2d3fd4bdc2d5f408b4567 Description:
The industrial estate and facilities of Chemical Plant No. 16 were rented out illegally to the TerraGroup corporation. During the advent of the Contract Wars, the plant became the scene of numerous firefights between BEAR and USEC that ultimately determined control over the industrial district of Tarkov.

Later on, in the wake of the chaos, the plant facilities became a shelter for the remaining civilians, Scavs, and military operatives, including the scattered remains of the BEAR and USEC contingents.
56db0b3bd2720bb0678b4567 Description: A makeshift arena for gladiator fights, redesigned by remaining locals out of Equator-2 shopping mall.
56f40101d2720b2a4d8b45d6 Description: A large area of industrial park land situated adjacent to the factory zone. The area houses a customs terminal, fuel storage facilities, offices, and dorms, as well as a variety of other infrastructure and buildings.
5704e3c2d2720bac5b8b4567 Description: The Priozersk Nature Reserve recently became part of the state-protected wildlife reserves of the North-Western Federal District.
5704e47ed2720bb35b8b4568 Description: The Verkhneye urban settlement is a small town by the seaside, favoured by locals as an exceptional gardening and outdoor recreation spot.
5704e4dad2720bb55b8b4567 Description: The lighthouse at Cape Dalniy was an important strategic object on the way to Tarkov. During Contract Wars, it was the main entry point for USEC units and served as their base of operations. After the conflict, Scavs took a fancy to this place, until the old owners returned, who decided to stay in Tarkov and establish their own order.
5704e554d2720bac5b8b456e Description:
The Shoreline area makes up a large part of the outskirts of Tarkov and is located next to the Port.

The area houses a partially abandoned village, modern private housing, agricultural fields, long stretches of beach, a boating facility, gas station, weather station, and a cellular tower as well as other commercial facilities.

Shoreline's main point of interest is the Azure Coast health resort which consists of several blocks, exclusively powered by a nearby hydroelectric power plant. The resort had previously been used as temporary accommodation for members of TerraGroup and the corporation's associated divisions in preparation for the evacuation of the Tarkov Port.
5704e5a4d2720bb45b8b4567 Description: The southern port Terminal has been under Russian Armed Forces control since the beginning of the Tarkov conflict. After the city was sealed off, the terminal was fortified and became the primary evacuation point, sought by both civilian refugees and PMC units. According to unconfirmed reports, TerraGroup personnel were also evacuated through this port.
5704e5fad2720bc05b8b4567 Description: The secret Federal State Reserve Agency base that, according to urban legends, contains enough supplies to last for years: food, medications, and other resources, enough to survive an all-out nuclear war.
5704e64ad2720bb55b8b456e Description: Private residential sector consisting of cottages of the upper-class citizens of Tarkov. In the first weeks of the emerging chaos, it served as a refugee staging camp but has since then become a known scavenger haunt.
5714dbc024597771384a510d Description: The South Interchange is a key transport location for the city. This strategic area connects the port and harbor with the industrial outskirts of Tarkov. Located in the center of the interchange is a huge ULTRA shopping mall which was used as the main base of operation for the EMERCOM evacuation.
5714dc342459777137212e0b Description: The suburb and commuter areas of Tarkov containing all the infrastructure and creature comforts needed for a long and happy life.
5714dc692459777137212e12 Description: Downtown Tarkov houses banks, malls, and hotels, as well as all the other amenities a thriving metropolis could have needed.
599319c986f7740dca3070a6 Description: A makeshift gladiator-style arena, redesigned by the remaining locals out of the Equator-2 shopping mall.
59fc81d786f774390775787e Description:
The industrial estate and facilities of Chemical Plant No. 16 were rented out illegally to the TerraGroup corporation. During the advent of the Contract Wars, the plant became the scene of numerous firefights between BEAR and USEC that ultimately determined control over the industrial district of Tarkov.

Later on, in the wake of the chaos, the plant facilities became a shelter for the remaining civilians, Scavs, and military operatives, including the scattered remains of the BEAR and USEC contingents.
5b0fc42d86f7744a585f9105 Description: Secret underground TerraGroup Labs facility hidden right under the center of Tarkov. Officially, this research center does not exist and, based on data scraps, is engaged in research and development as well as testing and simulation of projects in chemistry, physics, biology, and other high technology.
61e800b841ee214fbf1f0e53 Description: An abandoned terminal hangar, borrowed by locals to become one of the death arenas.
621df90bf200a905ed57d31d Description: A makeshift arena for gladiator fights, redesigned by remaining locals out of Equator-2 shopping mall.
62a05c960a18b50b7c575b1b Description: A former TerraGroup Labs guarded cargo storage section in the harbor area.
62a20c387949e8388b2f97c8 Description: An old private sawmill between the city and the suburbs. It was rumored to be a TerraGroup Labs reserve covert command center with an autonomous control system.
62eba95b7ba21c1d534d305a Description: A bowl of the old sports arena with stands, converted for death-fighting.
6441004f8ab20b218807f14b Description: A car chop shop on the outskirts of Tarkov. It used to be a place where stolen cars were dismantled for parts, but now it's used to host firefights.
64b7d7f23d81c8a9ee03ac27 Description: A courtyard in one of the residential neighborhoods, re-equipped for Arena fights.
653e6760052c01c1c805532f Description: The business center of Tarkov. This is where TerraGroup was headquartered. This is where it all began.
65b8d6f5cdde2479cb2a3125 Description: The business center of Tarkov. This is where TerraGroup was headquartered. This is where it all began. The area has yet again become a hot zone since the early days of the conflict.
65cc8f81a9aac3e77d0cfd3e Description: The southern port Terminal has been under Russian Armed Forces control since the beginning of the Tarkov conflict. After the city was sealed off, the terminal was fortified and became the primary evacuation point, sought by both civilian refugees and PMC units. According to unconfirmed reports, TerraGroup personnel were also evacuated through this port.
662b728d328cb632bd0c6caf Description: The railway station, whose trains connected Tarkov with other cities in the Norvinsk region, was opened after reconstruction on the eve of the conflict. It is now used as an arena for battles.
6690e7e7dc976e4c780336b1 Description: A 19th century sea fort, which by fate became a prison at first and then after a century got turned into an arena for gladiatorial fights.
6733700029c367a3d40b02af Description: A facility of one of TerraGroup's contractors, Knossos LLC. According to public sources, they build amusement and theme parks. However, this place looks more like a heavily fortified bunker than a new theme park.
68236e8153654e8c1200798a Description: The business center of Tarkov. This is where TerraGroup was headquartered. This is where it all began.
5464e0404bdc2d2a708b4567 Description: The USEC private military company was established in 1999 after the merger of two companies: KerniSEC and Safe Sea. In 2004, an agent of TerraGroup International Holding made contact with USEC, which then consecutively made USEC, essentially, a private army of the holding, with offices all around the world, and over 7500 staff strong.
5464e0454bdc2d06708b4567 Description: The BEAR private military company was established by a secret decree of the Russian Federation Government as a countermeasure against the illegal activities of TerraGroup on Russian soil.
5803a58524597710ca36fcb2 Description: TerraGroup is a transnational holding company whose subsidiaries engage in a wide range of activities. TG incorporates over 40 large enterprises, represented by branch offices in over 120 countries.
5805f617245977100b2c1f41 Description: A UK-based private limited company (PLC) and a subsidiary of the TerraGroup International Holding corporation. Officially deals in scientific research concerning biotechnology applied in agribusiness industry and farming.
5807be8924597742c603fa19 Description: Tarkov is a city in northwestern Russia, a municipal entity within the Norvinsk region, and one of two principal cities of the Norvinsk Special Economic Zone.
5807bfe124597742a92e0a4c Description: A limited territory within the Norvinsk region, including the cities of Norvinsk and Tarkov, with adherent objects of infrastructure, possessing a special legal status in relation to the rest of Russia, a privileged economic zone for national and foreign enterprises.
5807c3f124597746bf2db2ce Description: Amidst the chaos and lawlessness, scarcity of vital provisions, and territory, the first to lift up their heads are shady characters, unaffected by excessive moral or ethical restraints, or who are quick to lose them under hostile influences and conditions. They gather in packs, live by dog-eat-dog rules, and cut each other's throats for a bigger piece. This is how yesterday's civilians became Scavs.
5c1b857086f77465f465faa4 Description: A shady group of armed people who, according to rumors, consist of former PMC operators and local residents. They possess great combat and tactical skills.
63a9c1f5662a5b0a2c7fbde5 Description: Tarkov is a city in northwestern Russia, a municipal entity within the Norvinsk region, and one of two principal cities of the Norvinsk Special Economic Zone.
64c0acf85174e095610734a0 Description: Sherpas are players who help beginners study the main game features and improve their skills to survive the harsh Tarkov environment. This difficult and honorable task falls on the shoulders of the most friendly, patient, and experienced players.
64c0ad6af99768b777048f4e Description: Emissaries are volunteers from all over the world who are actively involved in the Escape from Tarkov community and support Battlestate Games. Emissaries create content, make sure every voice in the community is heard, and make official messages clear and accessible to players anywhere in the world.
6724cde3b1130abeee0c3db7 Description: Rumors have spread around Tarkov about a leak from the TerraGroup Laboratory. Residents affected by the substance have shown sudden changes in behavior and bouts of aggression. The number of casualties is rapidly increasing. With this new threat endangering the entire city, conflicts between the factions in Tarkov have significantly decreased. It's possible that the leaders of each side have agreed to a temporary truce.

616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: All clear, you say? Good work then, soldier.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 54c: Ah, warrior. Listen, I need some help with scouting a location - need to walk around a couple of places, check out the situation there, maybe find escape routes. Not for free - you'll get rewarded, of course. Alright, pack up, we'll be waiting for your news.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Marvelous, young man. Thank you for the work.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 54c: Greetings, young man. My workers have to deliver several batches of valuable medicine, but I am too cautious to send them alone without making sure the path is safe. If you are available, then please help us, for the good of all civilians. You only have to scout the area and ensure a safe passage. Are you interested?
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Young man, now is not the time for hasty decisions. Think about this carefully, weigh all the options. But do not take too long - the matter is urgent, so I will have to look for a better employee if you refuse.
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: So, how's the situation? Good, all going well then.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 583: C'mere, mister operator, let's talk. How are you doing, lad, busy? Not busy then. I need to scout an area so that my things go smoothly. Go check it out, alright? I don’t want my men to get into any fights. So yeah, come back to me when you're done. I'll be here.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Good, good. You've done well, mercenary. You're free to go.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 593: Ah, mercenary, do you want to do a good deed? My clients are asking to ensure a safe area to conduct a specific secret operation. I would like to appoint you for this, as you are the most competent of the local workers. You will have to survey the area and report back to me. Good luck, mercenary.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: I wouldn’t want to waste time looking for another worker. Are you sure you want to put me into such a complicated situation, mercenary?
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Alright, here's my map, show me what you found. Good, I'll let the clients know. Thank you, friend.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5a7: Mercenary, do you have a minute? I've prepared an order for the clients, but they need a guarantee that the way to the meeting spot is safe. If you aren't busy, can you find a route for them? Find a safe passage, a way to leave safely, you get me. Thank you, I’ll owe you one.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: A pity, certainly. I wanted to ask you specifically to do this job… I really started to like working with you. Don’t rush to refuse though, okay? Maybe things will change.
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Awesome, brother, I won’t forget this!
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5ac: Hey there, brother, I have some stuff to deal with. There are a couple of guys with whom I really-really want to meet and discuss a couple of things, but these guys are very shy and won't get into any mess. Can you help me out with this matter? Just look around for any safe route for them so that nobody bothers them. Alright?
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Well, guess it’s time to head out then. Thank you, kid.
616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5c0: Come on in for some tea, kid. I'm preparing to go hunting today, and could use some scouting in the area. Can you go check it out? I'd be grateful.
616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I've already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: There you are! You got everything? Good stuff.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 54c: Hey there, come on in. Do you by any chance know of any magical place where you can always find whatever you need? There's an order for some supplies, and I've got no clue where to find them right now. Wanna help me out? For a reward, of course.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: You've done a good deed, mercenary.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 54c: Good afternoon, young man. In our troubling times, it's hard to remain in abundance, you have to agree. I've received an order for a batch of specific resources, but I am unable to acquire them. Will you help us, mercenary? Here is a list of all needed items.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Young man, now is not the time for hasty decisions. Think about this carefully, weigh all the options. But do not take too long - the matter is urgent, so I will have to look for a better employee if you refuse.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Here's our errand boy. You've done good, mate.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 583: Hey, wanna look for some goodies? I need to find some stuff, but my lads are all busy with the more important stuff. You, however, look like you're eager to help a friend out! C'mere, I'll draw you your shopping list. Off you go then.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Marvelous, my friend. You have our thanks.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 593: Good afternoon. I have an order for specific goods that the Blue Helmets would not be able to obtain. However, we have you, mercenary, and with your skills, it will be a breeze for you. Here is the list of the required items. Don't let me down.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: I wouldn’t want to waste time looking for another worker. Are you sure you want to put me into such a complicated situation, mercenary?
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Good work, mercenary. I owe you one.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5a7: Hello, mercenary. Listen, I've got an order for various supplies, but I don't have some of them in stock for the moment. I'd be extremely grateful if you found them for me. Here's the list, all info is in there. Thank you.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: A pity, certainly. I wanted to ask you specifically to do this job… I really started to like working with you. Don’t rush to refuse though, okay? Maybe things will change.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: What a legend, always helps a brother out!
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5ac: Hey, brother. I've got a big full-packed list of special goods for delivery, and the clients are still waiting. Can you go look for the needed stuff to help your best bro Arshavir?
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Thank you, kid, good job. Here, that’s for the trouble.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5c0: Hey there, kid. I'm running low on some of the supplies, some for my store, some for me. Can you help me out? Wait here, I'll make a list. Thank you.
61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I’ve already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.

6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 54c: Welcome, soldier! Can you help me out with a thing? Need to run around a place, check out the situation and escape routes. For what? Ain't you a nosy one. If I’m asking, it means I need it. The quicker you do it, the better.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Thank you for your work. You have helped to save several lives.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 54c: Good afternoon, young man. Are you able to help us? We’re stationing several seriously injured patients, and we won’t be able to extract them with our forces alone. We have to transfer them from the city, and there they will be taken away and taken to the hospital. Come again? No, you will not have to carry them yourself. You’ll only have to scout the area, the route along which my assistants will evacuate the injured.

6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 583: Alright, listen up, mate, straight to the point. I need you to stroll somewhere and check out if the place is safe and all that.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.

6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 593: Hello, soldier! Are you ready to help the people? Big goals start small. Please survey the marked location and find extraction points, this will help save dozens of lives.

6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: I’m glad you’re back. I’ve prepared something for you.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 5a7: Hello! It’s good that you’re here. I’ve ordered a bunch of spare parts for my work, they’ll be transported around here. Can you go there and check how safe the area is? I wouldn’t want to lose such cargo for nothing.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: A pity, certainly. I wanted to ask you specifically to do this job… I really started to like working with you. Don’t rush to refuse though, okay? Maybe things will change.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Perfect, brother! Here, take this, will be useful.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 5ac: Come on in, bro! How are things? I’m planning a big deal right now. Check out the situation there, help a brother out, yeah?
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Understood. Here, that’s for the help.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 5c0: Glad you came by. I don’t get many visitors. I myself would be covered by moss already if not for hunting. I’m packing up for one tomorrow, by the way. Can you scout the path? I’ll be going here on the map, wouldn’t want to catch a bullet. You’ve got a way clearer eyesight than me, kid. Let me know of anything you discover. Well, bless you then.
6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I’ve already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Thanks, comrade! The country won’t forget this.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 54c: Where in the bloody hell is it… It’s always like that, always run out of things just as you need them… Hey, soldier! Can you help me find something?
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Have you found it all? You have my thanks, young man.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 54c: Yes, young man, something is constantly lacking in the time of war... If there is an excess of bandages - there are not enough antibiotics, if there are antibiotics - there are not enough basic food supplies. Let me write down what we need, and perhaps if you stumble upon any of this, can take this with you for us?

6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Got it all? Lemme check. Nice, all here.

6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: A pity, certainly. I wanted to ask you specifically to do this job… I really started to like working with you. Don’t rush to refuse though, okay? Maybe things will change.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Alright, show me. Yup, all here. Nice job!
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 5ac: Hey bro, wanna help out the good guys? Here, I have an order from them. Need to find everything from the list. Nah, it’s not super urgent.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Did you find it? Well I’ll be damned! A damn good man you are, soldier.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 5c0: Come on in, warrior. The tea is ready. Interested in what I’m writing here, huh? It’s just a list of what I need in the household. Something of this could be useful for business too, to send to the right people. Can you help me find some of it?
6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I’ve already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 54c: Come on in, don’t just stand in the doorway, dammit. Why am I so moody today, you ask? Well, I’ve got a rat problem… People don’t know where they shouldn’t stick their hands in. Maybe you could help me out with this? I’ll get you something in return.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: The bandits were eliminated? You have my thanks.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 54c: I need a person that is able to do hard work without unnecessary emotions. A group of people of unknown nationality constantly disrupts the supply of medicines. I’ll be frank: they kill couriers and take medicines for themselves. Mercenary, this arbitrariness must be stopped.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: Young man, now is not the time for hasty decisions. Think about this carefully, weigh all the options. But do not take too long - the matter is urgent, so I will have to look for a better employee if you refuse.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: Get your reward then. Better than a Christmas present, hehe!
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 583: I have a matter to deal with. I’ll entrust it to you, so keep your mouth shut. Need to smoke some morons, no fuss no muss. Huh? Of course, they deserved that.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 593: Are you looking for work, mercenary? There is something of your caliber. We require the elimination of several dangerous individuals known to have been participating in civilian killings. Is the task clear? And make sure to keep yourself safe - you’re a valuable employee, it would be a shame to lose you.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: I wouldn’t want to waste time looking for another worker. Are you sure you want to put me into such a complicated situation, mercenary?
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: Thank you, brother. Took care of those bastards.
6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 5ac: Help me out, brother, will you? I relied on some assholes by mistake. They ran off with the goods. Not only did they kill my people, but now they’re going around and letting everyone know how easily they screwed Arshavir over. Those morons have to go. You can keep whatever you find on them, I’ll reward you for the job too, for real.

6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: Oh, well. Looks like there’s no end to this scum. You didn’t get hit, at least?

6642165a2a9057fc17065108 description 661: Take my advice, Champion: keep your score up. How are people supposed to bet on you if no one knows your name? Get out there and slay. Make them remember who you are.

665462d9479d0207c60da93f description 661: Hello, Champion. So lately there's been a lot of wimps among the gladiators. It needs to change. You up? Don't forget to report back once you're done. If you're still alive that is.
66548e314b855b7a3a0084c8 description 661: Hello, Champion. So lately there's been a lot of wimps among the gladiators. It needs to change. You up? Don't forget to report back once you're done. If you're still alive that is.

67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: You don't want to up your skills, huh? Whatever, you'll come crawling back to me later.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT: I knew you were ready to invest in yourself! You know the figures now, I've already arranged everything on the other side.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583: I remember you liked learning from the real experts. I found a contact who can take you to the next level. But I need the cash now, and there's only one expert in the whole city, so you're gonna have to shell out.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: Bad decision. Many people pay serious money for this guy's services. Well, whatever, it's your loss.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT: I knew you'd be ready! My mate's already preparing the material for you, all serious business. You're lucky you keep in touch with me.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583:
You and I, we've been through some shit before. By the way, I got a mate who's been working here since the war started.

I thought maybe you'd be interested in talking to an experienced specialist like him. Not for free, of course. If you want to raise your skills, bring the dough.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: Won't even help your friend in need? This offer is for you only, and you don't even appreciate it. When you're in need, don't count on me.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT:
Cool. Leave the money here, and when you go to Slavka's, please don't... Don't mention his age. He's still a kid, but he's a true prodigy! 
Ask him anything you want, from ballistics to market economics.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583:
Let's get straight to the point. I'm a little tight on cash right now, so I got a special offer for you. You warm me up with a little cash, and in return, I'll set you up with one of my specialists. I'm hiding this kid from everyone because he's one of a kind. But you and me, we're tight, so I know can trust you.

But you should know, that's me being nice right now. I need the cash this week, otherwise the deal's off. My lad has enough to do even without coaching.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: What? I've already got a waiting line for this intel, with better offers! You don't know how much knowledge you've just missed out on.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT:
You know what you're doing! There's already a queue for these docs, someone even offered me a higher price, but I'd rather give it to you. 

You're a trusted partner, and I know you won't use this knowledge against me.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583:
Got a proposal that might be of interest to you. I've recently got my hands on some documents on advanced training for USEC officers. Such information won't help ordinary soldiers, of course, they'll get iced anyway.

But a wolf like you will definitely benefit from veteran secrets. Obviously, such proposal won't last long, so your time to think is limited.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 failMessageText: Fucking waffler. You think you know more than everybody else? Well, good fucking luck then.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 successMessageT:
I'll have to postpone some business because of this, but for a trusted friend, it's no big deal.

Two conditions: you don't pass this information on to anyone else and you don't document it in any way, you understand? If the westerners find out about the leak, it's gonna be bad news for everyone here.
67b3491b05fcb6db310cfca7 description 583:
Well, mate, how long has it been since you raised your professional skills? I had a chat with Peacekeeper, and he told me a few secrets from the experience of our "Western colleagues". I guess sometimes it's really useful to look at a situation from a different perspective.

It's obvious that you're already a warrior with experience, but this info is really valuable. If you're interested, I can share it with you. But I have a lot of work right now, so you'll have to pay for my time.

6877c834b52f568d4b0ea5a5_Note_Page1_Text: The preparation for the Arrival has already begun! The world has ignited with the Blue Fire, and its dusk is near It is time to entrust the Eye of the World to those who know all For only the Wardens can safeguard the memory! Only they will carry the memory of humankind into the New World Only then will the Door be opened
6877c84d020406d3ea060551_Note_Page1_Text:
<align="center"><size=20>The new software still hasn’t been launched.
While all this crap goes on, the rollback to backup
settings has been assigned to the button under the desk.
What else can we do? These morons have already accidentally
rolled back 4 times because no one understands how this shit
actually works!
So for now, the reboot is on the button.
Do NOT touch the button under the desk!!!
Anyone who does gets a fine!</size></align>

6891bb83d7502d512502d160_Note_Page1_Text: Tarkov News Issue #142 ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ Escalation in Tarkov The military conflict in Tarkov continues to escalate. Eyewitnesses remaining in the city report increasing clashes between BEAR and USEC units. UN forces and the Russian Armed Forces are cordoning off dangerous areas, but these zones are growing, and according to unconfirmed reports, high-level discussions are already underway regarding a potential full lockdown of the city. Both PMC groups likely still maintain their supply channels for weapons and personnel, which is why almost no one is willing to make optimistic forecasts. Evacuation of civilians is difficult, and both sides are organizing humanitarian aid drops to help local residents hold out until safe corridors open. Amid the crisis, local criminal groups are also becoming more active. In some cases, these groups manage to seize weapons and take control of parts of the city. Currently, three such areas are known. In the city center, the criminal gang of a former entrepreneur, known by the alias "Kaban", has established a fortified base in the former LexOs car dealership. According to recent data, PMC units have unsuccessfully attempted to dislodge the gang several times. An anonymous source told the editorial team that Kaban possesses samples of heavy weaponry that cannot even be obtained on the black market. Some experts suggest a possible connection between Kaban and the nonprofit organization "Forward Movement", which was previously linked in a high-profile case involving deputy minister of economy Yaroslav Shkurenko and the criminal authority nicknamed Chepyga. Near the customs terminal, the "Zavodskoy" gang, previously involved in petty thefts in the district, has been spotted. Eyewitnesses report ongoing gunfire in that area. EMERCOM units were forced to abandon evacuation points near the "Ultra" mall due to increased attacks by armed groups that took control of one floor of the mall. EMERCOM tents at the nearby highway interchange are no longer safe. EMERCOM recommendations remain the same: first, find a secure shelter and wait for evacuation there, provide aid to the wounded if possible, and avoid venturing onto city streets. We hope that UN forces and the Russian Armed Forces will take more decisive measures to cool the conflict in Tarkov and will continue reporting all important developments. ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ HUMANITARIAN AID POINTS BY TARKOV DISTRICTS Komsomolsky District Ordzhonikidze Ave, 3. 7:10
Before Takeoff

Pilot <u>Arsenyev</u>:
Selectors to auto. Cross-check.

7:14
Takeoff

7:43
Aircraft reached cruising altitude

Pilot <u>Belyakov</u>:
Reached cruising altitude. All systems on autopilot.

Dispatcher:
Copy that. Report when... (indistinct static)

Dispatcher:
Return to the airport.

Pilot Belyakov:
Huh, what the hell is that?..

Pilot Arsenyev:
Doesn't sound like the dispatcher.

Unknown:
Return immediately. (indistinct static)

Dispatcher:
Flight <u>RA-67996</u>, do you copy?

Pilot Belyakov:
Comms are glitching.

Pilot Belyakov:
Shit, look, someone’s typing. "Turn back to the airport…" What the fuck? Is this some kind of prank?

Pilot Arsenyev:
Some "<u>Mr. Kerman</u>"… We should contact security.

Pilot Belyakov:
This guy won’t stop, look at that! "They’re going to shoot you down. Fly lower."

(Sound of doors opening)
689b4d39987b304021088e8d_Note_Page2_Text:
<u>Passenger</u> not identified:
Sasha, Seryoga, change course fast and head back to the airport.

Pilot Arsenyev:
Huh? Did we forget someone or what?

Passenger:
Someone contacted me - they're going to shoot us down. Turn around now, damn it!

Pilot Arsenyev:
It’s not that simple!

Passenger:
I don't give a fuck! They're going to hit us! Fly lower, turn around, make an emergency landing – I don’t fucking care how!

Pilot Belyakov:
It’s just a joke! Who the fuck would do that? That's bullshit, the only thing under us is…

(Whistling of a projectile, crash, screams of flight attendants. Sounds of emergency alarms)

Pilot Arsenyev:
Hydraulics are gone!

Pilot Belyakov:
They're fucking shooting at us! Mayday! Mayday!

(Crash, screams, sounds of alarms, heavy breathing from the pilots)

689b4f5f6035689a0c0724ce_Note_Page1_Text:
Ms. A
By this time, you must have everything ready. The director is waiting for the results.

Person-1
Everything will be done to perfection, you can count on me. I’ve already prepared a documentation package and distributed all the directives. Protocol TG-002 is in effect.

Ms. A
Excellent. As I have said, everything has to go perfectly. There may be deviations, but they will be minimal. Report everything directly to me. We are lifting protocols TG-IS-13 for you.

Ms. A
And remember – we are all counting on you.

Person-1
Will all my guarantees be retained? After the... you know.

Ms. A
Of course. You will keep your income in the new world, be sure of that. Everything will go as planned, as I said before. However, you will have to wait for some time until the G7 governments are fully staffed under our direction.

Person-1
Okay. I just… It's amazing to be involved in something of this magnitude.

Ms. A
Have you submitted documents for your relatives? Wife, children? Are they eligible for ER-3?

Person-1
No. The new world is for a new family. 

Ms. A
I see.
Be sure to have everything ready for your temporary successor. As per protocol TG-002, you will evacuate first, while they will take over in your absence.

Person-1
I've got it all ready.

Ms. A
See you at headquarters, then.

689b52d6886e9848a4085917_Note_Page1_Text: HIGHLY CLASSIFIED DESTROY AFTER READING Purpose and characteristics Item #1156 — an aerosol augmenter of radio-frequency electromagnetic emission (RF-EMI), designed to neutralize enemy electronic equipment over a large area. The item can be used on its own or as the warhead component of delivery systems (tactical, operational-tactical, and medium range). Weight: 37.080 kg Dimensions: 2500*800*800 Effect radius: 15 to 40 km depending on medium density Activation: 1. Remote initiation using a timed/distance fuze (up to 200m) / 2. Remote initiation via radio communication (within the radio’s operational range) General design The shock-wave emitter operates by means of spherically symmetric compression of the electromagnetic field. The fuze consists of a magnetic system that directs magnetic poles to the center of a sphere formed by two intersecting magnetic flux rings. Inside the magnetic flux sphere is a detonation distributor, made from a plastic sphere with 45 channels filled with an initiating high explosive (lead azide was tested). The channel system ensures simultaneous arrival of the detonation wave at the main explosive charge. At the center of the detonation distributor is the main explosive charge (tested mixtures included trotyl-hexogen combinations, octogen, and tetryl). Embedded in the center of the main charge is a cesium iodide single crystal treated with mixture #3012. Features Using spherically symmetric compression of the electromagnetic field together with treatment of the cesium iodide single crystal with mixture #3012 provides a significant increase in pulse efficiency compared to known EMI weapon prototypes. Measurements taken during testing showed retention of 40 to 50% of the explosive energy. #: 2 Signature ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲
689b52d6886e9848a4085917_Note_Page2_Text: HIGHLY CLASSIFIED DESTROY AFTER READING Upon detonation of Item #1156 a high-frequency magnetic field is generated that establishes a standing spatial RF-EMI wave. This substantially reduces the effectiveness of EMI protection by shielding and increases the disabling effect of Item #1156. During tests a blue glow was also observed. The cause of this effect has not yet been determined. It is hypothesized that the optical phenomenon is similar in nature to ionization of gas molecules, like that which occurs during the aurora borealis. Predicted effects of deployment Use in a large city (Tarkov, Moscow, London, Singapore, etc.) will result in guaranteed power outages across the agglomeration and destruction of electrical equipment within a 15 km radius of detonation, significant damage to electrical equipment in the 15 to 28 km band, and possible damage to electrical equipment in the 28 to 40 km band. For maximum effectiveness, detonation of Item #1156 should be carried out from an elevated position (communications tower, construction crane, high-rise building, etc.). #: 2 Signature ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲ ̲
689b52ff147eeab4410ecd16_Note_Page1_Text:
